title: [1.8+]原版更好的刷怪蛋
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2015-7-24 23:46 编辑 

大家好！我是新人2467295749{:10_513:，你们可以叫我246
行了，不说废话了，我们开始进入正题





























视频：
http://www.aipai.com/c24/Pzs6JSErISNpJGss.html


原理在下一页...






一键指令（复制到指令方块即可）/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-28 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~2 ~-19 ~6 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-18 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=VillagerGolem] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Wolf,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-17 ~10 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon VillagerGolem ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-15 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem] id 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-14 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[type=SnowMan] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-14 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon SnowMan ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-13 ~9 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Sheep,name=SnowMan] id 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-11 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Giant] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-10 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon Giant ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-10 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=Giant] id 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-9 ~8 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=WitherBoss] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-7 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Bat,name=WitherBoss] id 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-6 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon WitherBoss ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-6 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=EnderDragon] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Enderman,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-5 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon EnderDragon ~ ~ ~"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-3 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon] id 1"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard objectives add id dummy"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~1 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~2 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:red,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"关闭系统请按上面\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:gray,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"关闭系统请按上面\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:gray,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"关闭系统请按上面\\",bold:True,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:green,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~1 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 65 {display:{Name:WitherBoss},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 58 {display:{Name:EnderDragon},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 95 {display:{Name:VillagerGolem},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 91 {display:{Name:SnowMan},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @p minecraft:spawn_egg 64 54 {display:{Name:Giant},ench:[]}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~32 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码

分散指令
首先先创造记分板
/scoreboard objectives add id dummy复制代码

第一个
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem] id 1复制代码指令讲解：给一只叫VillagerGolem的狼在id分数设置为1

第二个
/execute @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon VillagerGolem ~ ~ ~复制代码指令讲解：在一只分数为1的狼上召唤一只铁傀儡
第三个
/execute @e[type=Wolf,name=VillagerGolem,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=VillagerGolem] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Wolf,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~复制代码指令讲解：将分数为1的狼tp至虚空
第四个
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon] id 1复制代码指令讲解：给一只叫EnderDragon的小黑的id分数设置为1
第五个/execute @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon EnderDragon ~ ~ ~复制代码指令讲解：在一只分数为1的小黑上召唤一只末影龙
第六个
/execute @e[type=Enderman,name=EnderDragon,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=EnderDragon] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Enderman,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~复制代码指令讲解：将分数为1的小黑tp至虚空
第七个
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Bat,name=WitherBoss] id 1复制代码指令讲解：给一只叫WitherBoss的蝙蝠的id分数设置为1
第八个
/execute @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon WitherBoss ~ ~ ~复制代码指令讲解：在一只分数为1的蝙蝠上召唤一只凋灵
第九个
/execute @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=WitherBoss] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Bat,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~复制代码指令讲解：将分数为1的蝙蝠tp至虚空
第十个
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Zombie,name=Giant] id 1复制代码指令讲解：给一只叫Giant的僵尸的id分数设置为1
第十一个
/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon Giant ~ ~ ~复制代码指令讲解：在一只分数为1的僵尸上召唤一只巨人
第十二个
/execute @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Giant] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Zombie,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~复制代码指令讲解：将分数为1的僵尸tp至虚空
第十三个
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Sheep,name=SnowMan] id 1复制代码指令讲解：给一只叫SnowMan的羊的id分数设置为1
第十四个
/execute @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /summon SnowMan ~ ~ ~复制代码指令讲解：在一只分数为1的羊上召唤一只雪傀儡
第十五个
/execute @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=SnowMan] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[type=Sheep,score_id_min=1] ~ ~-999 ~复制代码指令讲解：将分数为1的羊tp至虚空




呼~~~~~~~~~{:10_493:}，终于打完了，竟然你们都看到这了，那我就给你们存档吧！（禁止伸手党）
存档下载
 还可以吧

replies.author: 彪悍的新手
replies.txt_content:
为什么要用到计分板 明明直接 /execute @e[name=名字,type=生物名] ~ ~ ~ summon 生物 ~ ~ ~
加上
 /execute @e[name=名字,type=生物名] ~ ~ ~ /kill @e[r=1,type=生物名,name=名字]
不就行了······

彪悍的新手 发表于 2015-5-30 08:54
为什么要用到计分板 明明直接 /execute @e[name=名字,type=生物名] ~ ~ ~ summon 生物 ~ ~ ~
加上
 /execut ...
职业习惯
